properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(select INQUIRY_NO, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "INQUIRY_DATE", ANSWER from INQUIRY I join product using(PRODUCT_NO) order by INQUIRY_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
select INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_DETAIL from inquiry where INQUIRY_NO = ?
update INQUIRY set answer = ? where INQUIRY_NO = ?
